code: import React from'react';import MessageList from'./MessageList';import MessageInput from'./MessageInput';import{useWebSocket}from'../../hooks/useWebSocket';import{useChatHomeBase}from'../../hooks/useChatHomeBase';import'../../styles/components/chat/ChatWindow.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var ChatWindow=()=>{const{messages,sendMessage,userStatus}=useChatHomeBase();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-window",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-status",children:userStatus}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageList,{messages:messages}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageInput,{onSendMessage:sendMessage})]});};ChatWindow=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const{sendMessage,lastMessage}=useWebSocket();const socket=new WebSocket('wss://seksnow.pl/ws');useEffect(()=>{if(lastMessage){setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,lastMessage]);}},[lastMessage]);const handleSendMessage=content=>{sendMessage(content);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-window",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageList,{messages:messages}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageInput,{onSendMessage:handleSendMessage})]});};export default ChatWindow;
